entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
